name: Cannonball!
description:
Make your ball go crazy and get the highest score!

In Cannonball!, a pixel-drawn 2D arcade game by Dyart Yoprey, you spin your racket to shoot a ball as fast as possible, breaking blocks and getting loads of points along the way.

Spin your way to the galaxy, and when there's only one block left, aim and shoot your cutest Cannonball to smash the tricky ones into pieces!

Planning to update it with more game modes, skins and supported devices. An android version is on the works as well. Feedback is appreciated! :)
